sceneObjects
Class Cylinder

java.lang.Object
  sceneObjects.SceneObject
      sceneObjects.Cylinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISceneObject
public class Cylinder
extends SceneObject

This class represents the cylinder scene object (finite non capped cylinder).
